<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Marshal Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2005) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 180 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Marshal](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=66)

**Prerequisites**
trained in martial weapons; Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or Trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

</column>

---

You've combined your social skills and combat training to become a talented combat leader. Choose [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7). You become trained in that skill or become an expert if you were already trained in it.

 In addition, you're surrounded by a marshal's aura in a 10-foot emanation. Your aura has the [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), and [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) traits and grants you and allies within the aura a +1 status bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68).

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the marshal archetype.

<title level="2">Marshal Dedication leads to...</title>
[Back to Back](/Feats.aspx?ID=2012), [Cadence Call](/Feats.aspx?ID=2010), [Coordinated Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2015), [Devrin's Cunning Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4134), [Dread Marshal Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2006), [Inspiring Marshal Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2007), [Push Back the Dead!](/Feats.aspx?ID=3615), [Rallying Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2011), [Snap Out of It! (Marshal)](/Feats.aspx?ID=2008), [Steel Yourself!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2009), [Target of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2017), [To Battle!](/Feats.aspx?ID=2013), [Topple Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=2014)
